title: Basketball Shots

description.title: Description
description.lead: Aim the ball, set the angle and power, and shoot to score as many points as you can. Simple controls, satisfying physics, quick fun.

how.title: How to play
how.caption: Three simple steps
how.intro: Learn the basics and start scoring right away:
items: Drag to choose the angle and power of your shot.
Release to throw the ball toward the hoop.
Adjust and repeat to beat your best score.

tips.title: Scoring & tips
tips.caption: Improve your shots
tips.intro: Small tweaks make a big difference:
items: Watch the arc — higher arc helps on longer shots.
Find a rhythm and keep a steady release.
Aim slightly above the rim for clean swishes.

features.caption: Why you'll like it
features.p: Easy to pick up, hard to put down:
